short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access Preqin’s powerful alternative asset market data directly from Chrome, without the need to navigate to Preqin Pro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Preqin Chrome Extension is a no-code solution that enables users to access Preqin’s best-in-class private market data directly from Chrome or Chromium-based browsers like Microsoft Edge, and Opera. 

Key features: 

Search for and highlight entities on any webpage directly via the extension with the right-click-to-search feature, or run new searches via the extension search bar. 

Access entities mini profiles displaying a snapshot of high-level Preqin data to support your decision-making. 

Add and save entities of interest to your Preqin Pro target lists, avoiding workflow disruption.  

The Preqin Chrome Extension is available only to Preqin Pro subscribers. For more information or support, please reach out to your account manager or email us at datadelivery@preqin.com.
